company.name: Bitcoin Vietnam
company.tagline: BitcoinVN is Vietnam's first crypto currency exchange and the easiest way to buy and sell Bitcoin
company.description:
We are the very first Bitcoin exchange business in Vietnam. As a young and highly motivated team we are dedicated to bring Bitcoin to the emerging economy of Vietnam. We provide Bitcoin vs Fiat conversion, reliable payment tools for merchants and a fast remittance road to Vietnam.

We also have our own Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5GjmQ-tbdtrs_0cc_5ILtQ?sub_confirmation=1
